params._proposalId: the id of the parameter proposal
the id of the sidechain proposal

confirmWithdraw(address).details: note that the stakes are delegated by the msgSender to the candidate

constructor.details: will initialize parent contract Govern first

params._advanceNoticePeriod: the wait time after the announcement and prior to the effective date of an update
params._dposGoLiveTimeout: the timeout for DPoS to go live after contract creatation
params._governProposalDeposit: required deposit amount for a governance proposal
params._governVoteTimeout: voting timeout for a governance proposal
params._minStakeInPool: the global minimum requirement of staking pool for each validator
params._slashTimeout: the locking time for funds to be potentially slashed

params._amount: the amount of CELR tokens to contribute

params._value: the new proposed value of this parameter

params._amount: the amount of delegated CELR tokens

getCandidateInfo(address).return: initialized whether initialized or notminSelfStake minimum self stakesstakingPool staking poolstatus candidate statusunbondTime unbond timecommissionRate commission raterateLockEndTime commission rate lock end time

getDelegatorInfo(address,address).return: delegatedStake delegated stake to this candidateundelegatingStake undelegating stakesintentAmounts the amounts of withdraw intentsintentProposedTimes the proposed times of withdraw intents

getMinStakingPool().return: the minimum staking pool of all validators

getParamProposalVote(uint256,address).return: the vote type of the given voter on the given parameter proposal

getSidechainProposalVote(uint256,address.return: the vote type of the given voter on the given sidechain proposal

initializeCandidate(uint256,uint256,uint.details: every validator must become a candidate first

params._minSelfStake: minimal amount of tokens staked by the validator itself
params._rateLockEndTime: the lock end time of initial commission rate

intendWithdraw(address,uint256).details: note that the stakes are delegated by the msgSender to the candidate

isMigrating().return: contract in migrating state or not

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

isSidechainRegistered(address).return: whether the given sidechain is registered or not

isValidator(address).return: the given address is a validator or not

nonIncreaseCommissionRate(uint256,uint25.details: It can increase lock end time immediately without waiting

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

redeemMiningReward(address,uint256).details: The validation of this redeeming operation should be done by the caller, a registered sidechain contractHere we use cumulative mining reward to simplify the logic in sidechain code

params._receiver: the receiver of the redeemed mining reward

registerSidechain(address).details: Owner can renounce Ownership if needed for this function

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params._penaltyRequest: penalty request bytes coded in protobuf

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

params._minSelfStake: minimal amount of tokens staked by the validator itself

validateMultiSigMessage(bytes).details: Can't use view here because _checkValidatorSigs is not a view function

params._request: a multi-signed message bytes coded in protobuf

params._proposalId: the id of the parameter proposal
the id of the sidechain proposal

withdrawFromUnbondedCandidate(address,ui.details: note that the stakes are delegated by the msgSender to the candidate

devdoc.title: A DPoS contract shared by every sidechain

announceIncreaseCommissionRate(uint256,u.notice: Announce the intent of increasing the commission rate

claimValidator().notice: Candidate claims to become a validator

confirmIncreaseCommissionRate().notice: Confirm the intent of increasing the commission rate

confirmUnbondedCandidate(address).notice: Confirm candidate status from Unbonding to Unbonded

confirmWithdraw(address).notice: Confirm an intent of withdrawing delegated stakes from a candidate

contributeToMiningPool(uint256).notice: Contribute CELR tokens to the mining pool

delegate(address,uint256).notice: Delegate CELR tokens to a candidate

drainToken(uint256).notice: Onwer drains one type of tokens when the contract is paused

getDelegatorInfo(address,address).notice: Get the delegator info of a specific candidate

getMinQuorumStakingPool().notice: Get minimum amount of stakes for a quorum

getMinStakingPool().notice: Get the minimum staking pool of all validators

getParamProposalVote(uint256,address).notice: Get the vote type of a voter on a parameter proposal

getSidechainProposalVote(uint256,address.notice: Get the vote type of a voter on a sidechain proposal

getTotalValidatorStakingPool().notice: Get the total amount of stakes in validators' staking pools

getUIntValue(uint256).notice: Get the value of a specific uint parameter

initializeCandidate(uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Initialize a candidate profile for validator

intendWithdraw(address,uint256).notice: Intend to withdraw delegated stakes from a candidate

isMigrating().notice: Check if the contract is in migrating state

isSidechainRegistered(address).notice: Get whether a sidechain is registered or not

isValidDPoS().notice: Check this DPoS contract is valid or not now

isValidator(address).notice: Check the given address is a validator or not

nonIncreaseCommissionRate(uint256,uint25.notice: Apply non-increase-commission-rate changes to commission rate or lock end time,  including decreasing commission rate and/or changing lock end time

registerSidechain(address).notice: Register a sidechain by contract owner

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

voteParam(uint256,uint8).notice: Vote for a parameter proposal with a specific type of vote

voteSidechain(uint256,uint8).notice: Vote for a sidechain proposal with a specific type of vote

withdrawFromUnbondedCandidate(address,ui.notice: Withdraw delegated stakes from an unbonded candidate

userdoc.notice: This contract holds the basic logic of DPoS in Celer's coherent sidechain system
